participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Emily enjoys connecting with people and sharing ideas. She has a creative mind and loves to help businesses flourish.
participant_1.background: My favorite band is Radiohead. We have two small dogs. I own my own small marketing consulting agency. I am married to my wonderful husband. I am a woman.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, Jake has a passion for cooking and storytelling. He loves the outdoors and often finds inspiration in nature.
participant_2.background: I am a short order cook at a local diner. I have a terrible singing voice. Under a pen name, I write romance books. This past summer I hiked the Appalachian Trail. I used to follow the Grateful Dead when they toured.

content.text: Hey there!
Hi there!
I'm participant_1, what's your name?
I'm participant_2.
Nice to meet you participant_1! What do you do for a living?
I'm a short order cook at a local diner.
Oh, that sounds fun! Do you like it?
Yeah, it's great! I get to meet a lot of people and I love cooking.
That's awesome! I'm a marketing consultant.
Oh, that sounds interesting! What's that like?
It's a lot of fun! I get to work with a lot of different companies and help them grow their businesses.
That sounds great! I've always been interested in marketing.
It's a great field! There's a lot of opportunity out there.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm thinking about going back to school to get my degree in marketing.
That's a great idea! I'm sure you'd do great.
Thanks! I'm excited about it.
I'm sure you'll be great!
Thanks!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, hike, and spend time with my family.
That sounds great! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by Stephen King or Dean Koontz. I also love historical fiction.
I love Stephen King too! I haven't read much Dean Koontz, but I've heard good things.
You should check him out! He's a great author.
I will!
What do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm a big fan of historical fiction and mysteries.
Oh, that sounds great! I'm not much of a mystery person, but I love historical fiction.
We can trade book recommendations sometime!
That would be fun!
It was nice meeting you, participant_1.
It was nice meeting you too, participant_2.
